channel.title: CVE Feed for Andrea Pernici -- Andrea Pernici News Sitemap for Google (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Andrea Pernici -- Andrea Pernici News Sitemap for Google (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2021-36912|2024-08-04T01:01:59.885Z -- andrea%20pernici -- andrea%20pernici%20news%20sitemap%20for%20google%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Andrea Pernici News Sitemap for Google plugin <= 1.0.16 on WordPress, attackers must have contributor or higher user role.
